article: a bosnian truck driver was killed and another injured tuesday when a un relief convoy was attacked as it left the moslem-held enclave of gorazde , a spokesman for the un high commissioner for refugees -lrb- unhcr -rrb- said .
abstract: one dead one injured as unhcr comes under fire
